input.query: How do I run the APGMS project locally?

output.answer: Install dependencies with `pnpm i`, build all workspaces using `pnpm -r build`, start services via `docker compose up -d`, and execute the test suites with `pnpm -r test` followed by `pnpm -w exec playwright test`.【F:apgms/README.md†L1-L8】
